data.name: Brookhaven OST
data.detailed_description:
This is the original soundtrack (OST) of the game Brookhaven, which was composed by Thales Guimaraes (@tacgmusic). It contains a total of 27 tracks that were custom-made, with a lot of love, for this amazing game.

All tracks presented here are in high quality lossless format (.wav/48 Khz, 24 bit) and also compressed (.mp3), for the best and most personalized listening experience. I hope you enjoy!

data.short_description: This is the full Original Soundtrack of Brookhaven. I hope you enjoy some quality music!
